name: Call of Senpai: Waifu Warfare
description:
Every 5 years the best Waifs who have been selected in their regions come to the main tournament called "Call of Senpai". Take control of the beautiful Miki, and explore the area from the ocean coast, to the deep jungle. Advance through the storyline and fight through various challenges for the title of main waifu and 5 million dollars.

- Cool characters with great humor.
- Complete missions to advance in the story.
- A hundreds meters of different locations and random events.
- Full adaptation for 4K resolution.
- AMD FSR support. Boost your frame rate with FidelityFX Super Resolution smart upscaling.
